info.title: Translator Knowledge Beacon Aggregator API
info.description: This is the Translator Knowledge Beacon Aggregator web service application programming interface (API) that provides integrated access to a pool of knowledge sources publishing concepts and relations through the Translator Knowledge Beacon API. This API is similar to that of the latter mentioned API with the addition of some extra informative endpoints plus session identifier and beacon indices. These latter identifiers are locally assigned numeric indices provided to track the use of specific registered beacons within the aggregator API itself.

get.description: Get a list of types and number of instances in the knowledge source, and a link to the API call for the list of equivalent terminology

parameters.name: beacons
parameters.description: set of aggregator indices of beacons to be used as knowledge sources for the query

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: client-defined session identifier

idmap.description: The URL to execute the exactmatches API call on the id

frequency.description: the number of instances of the specified type

200.description: Successful response with types and frequency returned

get.description: Retrieves details for a specified concepts in the system, as specified by a (url-encoded) CURIE identifier of a concept known the given knowledge source

parameters.name: conceptId
parameters.description: (url-encoded) CURIE identifier of concept of interest, e.g. wd:Q126691

parameters.name: beacons
parameters.description: set of aggregator indices of beacons to be used as knowledge sources for the query

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: client-defined session identifier

clique.description: CURIE identifying the inferred equivalent concept clique to which the concept belongs. This is assigned by an identifier precedence heuristic by the beacon-aggregator

id.description: CURIE for the concept in the specified knowledge beacon

aliases.description: set of alias CURIES in the equivalent concept clique of the concept

name.description: canonical human readable name of the concept

200.description: Successful response with concept details returned

get.description: Retrieves a (paged) list of concepts in the system

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: a (urlencoded) space delimited set of keywords or substrings against which to match concept names and synonyms, e.g. diabetes.

parameters.name: semanticGroups
parameters.description: a (url-encoded) space-delimited set of semantic groups (specified as codes CHEM, GENE, ANAT, etc.) to which to constrain concepts matched by the main keyword search (see [Semantic Groups](https://metamap.nlm.nih.gov/Docs/SemGroups_2013.txt) for the full list of codes)

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description:
(1-based) number of the page to be returned in a paged set of query
results

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description:
number of concepts per page to be returned in a paged set of query
results

parameters.name: beacons
parameters.description: set of aggregator indices of beacons to be used as knowledge sources for the query

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: client-defined session identifier

clique.description: CURIE identifying the inferred equivalent concept clique to which the concept belongs. This is assigned by an identifier precedence heuristic by the beacon-aggregator

id.description: CURIE for the concept in the specified knowledge beacon

aliases.description: set of alias CURIES in the equivalent concept clique of the concept

name.description: canonical human readable name of the concept

200.description: Successful response with concept list returned

get.description: Get a list of predicates used in statements issued by the knowledge source

name.description: exact unique human readable name of predicate relation

beacons.description: list of metadata for beacons that support the use of this predicate relation

beacon.description: aggregator index of the given beacon

id.description: unique CURIE-encoded identifier of predicate aggregator indices of beacons in the given beacon

definition.description: human readable definition assigned by the beacon for the predicate relation

200.description: Successful response with predicates with CURIE and definitions indexed by beacons which support the relation

get.description: Given a list of [CURIE-encoded](https://www.w3.org/TR/curie/) identifiers of exactly matching concepts, retrieves a paged list of concept-relations where either the subject or object concept matches at least one concept in the input list

parameters.name: c
parameters.description: set of [CURIE-encoded](https://www.w3.org/TR/curie/) identifiers of exactly matching concepts to be used in a search for associated concept-relation statements, e.g. wd:Q126691, wd:Q420626

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description:
(1-based) number of the page to be returned in a paged set of query
results

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description:
number of concepts per page to be returned in a paged set of query
results

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: a (url-encoded, space-delimited) string of keywords or substrings against which to match the subject, predicate or object names of the set of concept-relations matched by any of the input exact matching concepts

parameters.name: semanticGroups
parameters.description: a (url-encoded, space-delimited) string of semantic groups (specified as codes CHEM, GENE, ANAT, etc.) to which to constrain the subject or object concepts associated with the query seed concept (see [Semantic Groups](https://metamap.nlm.nih.gov/Docs/SemGroups_2013.txt) for the full list of codes)

parameters.name: relations
parameters.description: a (url-encoded, space-delimited) string of predicate relation identifiers with which to constrain the statement relations retrieved  for the given query seed concept. The predicate ids sent should  be as published by the beacon-aggregator by the /predicates API endpoint.

parameters.name: beacons
parameters.description: set of aggregator indices of beacons to be used as knowledge sources for the query

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: client-defined session identifier

200.description: Successful response returns a list of concept-relations where there is an exact match of an input concept identifier either to the subject or object concepts of the statement

id.description: CURIE-encoded identifier for statement (can be used to retrieve associated evidence)

clique.description: CURIE-encoded cannonical identifier of "equivalent concepts clique"

name.description: human readable label of subject concept

semanticGroup.description: a semantic group for the subject concept (specified as a code CHEM, GENE, etc. - see [Semantic Groups](https://metamap.nlm.nih.gov/Docs/SemGroups_2013.txt) for the full list of codes)

clique.description: CURIE-encoded cannonical identifier of "equivalent concepts clique"

name.description: human readable label of object concept

semanticGroup.description: a semantic group for the subject concept (specified as a code CHEM, GENE, etc. - see [Semantic Groups](https://metamap.nlm.nih.gov/Docs/SemGroups_2013.txt) for the full list of codes)

get.description: Retrieves a (paged) list of annotations cited as evidence for a specified concept-relationship statement

parameters.name: statementId
parameters.description: (url-encoded) CURIE identifier of the concept-relationship statement ("assertion", "claim") for which associated evidence is sought, e.g. kbs:Q420626_P2175_Q126691

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: (url-encoded, space delimited) keyword filter to apply against the label field of the annotation

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description:
(1-based) number of the page to be returned in a paged set of query
results

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: number of cited references per page to be returned in a paged set of query results

parameters.name: beacons
parameters.description: set of aggregator indices of beacons to be used as knowledge sources for the query

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: client-defined session identifier

200.description: successful call returns a list of annotation with metadata

id.description: CURIE-encoded identifier to an associated external resources (e.g. PMID of a pubmed citation)

label.description: canonical human readable and searchable label of the annotation (i.e. comment, matched sentence, etc.)

date.description: publication date of annotation (generally of format 'yyyy-mm-dd')
